mean_cn: adj. 有本领的，有能力的，（of）可以……的，能……的
mean_en: able to do something; having the qualities or abilities that are needed to do something
word_etyma: cap握住+able形容词后缀,具有某种性质的 → 有能力的，有才能的
sentence: Your penguin is a weightlifter? That must be a very capable bird!
sentence_trans: 你的企鹅是个举重运动员？那它一定是只非常能干的鸟！
